messages: 79d4fbd25229dd542eb533ea1bd0307a (06:57): is it possible to post using javascript? and can i do it with location. ?
a0e4ec720a249a3e5162548adbcc8f4f (06:58): HAIDEN:  yes you can, and no isn't done by means of location, is done by means of XMLHttpRequest()
2bdd04d0ec117ac0f48fb417f4542ad8 (06:58): or you could create a form and submit it if you want a refresh
a0e4ec720a249a3e5162548adbcc8f4f (06:58): HAIDEN:  check in google.com for XMLHttpRequest() or so-called ajax on doing a .post
79d4fbd25229dd542eb533ea1bd0307a (07:03): like for instance sending a username and password

0ff551825eefd6e6b2c3185f7e00b54f (07:04): Woosta: JIF is the Javascript Interaction Framework. It's just like AJAX but without an implied dependence on XML. Woosta's JIF library is available at http://rick.measham.id.au/javascript/jif.js
3c26b6648764f1ab4360aa71da5d760b (07:05): HAIDEN: check jifPost in the above library
79d4fbd25229dd542eb533ea1bd0307a (07:06): plist is an array of key,value?
3c26b6648764f1ab4360aa71da5d760b (07:08): If you supply a JS Object (key value list) then it will turn it into a string for you
79d4fbd25229dd542eb533ea1bd0307a (07:13): woosta.. the string would be the same as a GET line?
79d4fbd25229dd542eb533ea1bd0307a (07:21): Woosta, im getting Error: uncaught exception: Permission denied to call method XMLHttpRequest.open
3c26b6648764f1ab4360aa71da5d760b (07:21): You can't access documents on domains other than the one the calling page is on
79d4fbd25229dd542eb533ea1bd0307a (07:24): Woosta, how do you feel about your library being included in roundcube webmail?
79d4fbd25229dd542eb533ea1bd0307a (07:24): i will cite you of course
79d4fbd25229dd542eb533ea1bd0307a (07:25): im using your library to maintain session info between roundcube and maia mailguard
79d4fbd25229dd542eb533ea1bd0307a (07:26): so people can seemlessly change between them
79d4fbd25229dd542eb533ea1bd0307a (07:26): its not being used in maia
3c26b6648764f1ab4360aa71da5d760b (07:26): It's open source, so you can use it in open source
3c26b6648764f1ab4360aa71da5d760b (07:27): But I work in the mail protection industry for my $$ .. so don't tell my boss
